casebody.data:
Nyron DUMAS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 13, 2016 Heather Clark, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. 901 Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Nyron Dumas' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 130 , 145 A.3d 355 (2016), is denied.
